trans-unit.source: .NET Core Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 的必要條件

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 的必要條件

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites for Windows development
trans-unit.target: Windows 開發的必要條件

trans-unit.source: .NET Core development on Windows with Visual Studio requires:
trans-unit.target: 使用 Visual Studio 在 Windows 上進行 .NET Core 開發需具備︰

trans-unit.source: A supported version of the Windows client or operating system.
trans-unit.target: 支援的 Windows 用戶端或作業系統版本。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3 or later
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3 或更新版

trans-unit.source: NuGet Manager extension for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 的 NuGet 管理員擴充功能

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Tooling Preview 2
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具 Preview 2

trans-unit.source: Supported Windows versions
trans-unit.target: 支援的 Windows 版本

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is supported by the following versions of Windows:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 支援下列 Windows 版本：

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 SP1
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 SP1

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1

trans-unit.source: Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (完整伺服器或 Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 SP1 (完整伺服器或 Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1 (Full Server or Server Core)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1 (完整伺服器或 Server Core)

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2016 (Full Server, Server Core or Nano Server)
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2016 (完整伺服器、Server Core 或 Nano Server)

trans-unit.source: You can see the full set of [supported operating systems](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md#rtm-platform-support) in the [.NET Core Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 [.NET Core Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md) (.NET Core 版本資訊) 中查看完整的[支援作業系統](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/1.0/1.0.0.md#rtm-platform-support)。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core dependencies
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 的相依性

trans-unit.source: .NET Core requires the VC++ Redistributable when running on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 上執行 .NET Core 時，需要 VC++ 可轉散發套件。

trans-unit.source: It is installed for you by the .NET Core installer.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 安裝程式會為您進行這項安裝。

trans-unit.source: You need to install the Visual C++ redistributable manually if you are installing .NET Core via the installer script (`dotnet-install.ps1`).
trans-unit.target: 如果您要透過安裝程式指令碼 (`dotnet-install.ps1`) 安裝 .NET Core，則必須手動安裝 Visual C++ 可轉散發套件。

trans-unit.source: The Visual C++ Redistributable version differs by Windows version.
trans-unit.target: Visual C++ 可轉散發套件的版本與 Windows 版本不同。

trans-unit.source: Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Windows 10

trans-unit.source: [Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48145)
trans-unit.target: [適用於 Visual Studio 2015 的 Visual C++ 可轉散發套件](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48145)

trans-unit.source: Windows 7+ (not Windows 10)
trans-unit.target: Windows 7+ (不含 Windows 10)

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that your Windows installation is up-to-date and includes hotfix [KB2533623](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2533623) installed through Windows Update.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您的 Windows 安裝為最新狀態，而且包含已透過 Windows Update 安裝的 Hotfix [KB2533623](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2533623)。

trans-unit.source: [Universal CRT update](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48234) (you can get more info on what Universal CRT is in [this blog post](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2015/03/03/introducing-the-universal-crt/))
trans-unit.target: [通用 CRT 更新](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48234) (您可以在[這篇部落格文章](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2015/03/03/introducing-the-universal-crt/)中取得通用 CRT 功能的詳細資訊)

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: You need Visual Studio 2015 to develop .NET Core apps.
trans-unit.target: 您需具備 Visual Studio 2015 來開發 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You can download [Visual Studio Community 2015](https://www.visualstudio.com/downloads/download-visual-studio-vs) for free.
trans-unit.target: 您可以免費下載 [Visual Studio Community 2015](https://www.visualstudio.com/downloads/download-visual-studio-vs)。

trans-unit.source: Verify that you're running [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt752379.aspx):
trans-unit.target: 確認您是執行 [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt752379.aspx)：

trans-unit.source: On the **Help** menu, choose **About Microsoft Visual Studio**.
trans-unit.target: 在 [說明] 功能表上，選擇 [關於 Microsoft Visual Studio]。

trans-unit.source: In the **About Microsoft Visual Studio** dialog, the version number should be 14.0.25424.00 or higher, and include "Update 3".
trans-unit.target: 在 [關於 Microsoft Visual Studio] 對話方塊中，版本號碼應為 14.0.25424.00 或更高版本，並包含 "Update 3"。

trans-unit.source: If you don't have Update 3, you first need to download and install [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3](https://www.visualstudio.com/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs).
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有 Update 3，則必須先下載並安裝 [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3](https://www.visualstudio.com/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs)。

trans-unit.source: If you have Update 3 but the version number is smaller than 14.0.25424.00, you need to download and install [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt752379.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如果您有 Update 3，但版本號碼小於 14.0.25424.00，則必須下載並安裝 [Visual Studio 2015 Update 3.3](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt752379.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: You can read more about the changes in Update 3 in the [release notes](https://www.visualstudio.com/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在[版本資訊](https://www.visualstudio.com/news/releasenotes/vs2015-update3-vs)中，進一步了解 Update 3 的變更。

trans-unit.source: NuGet Manager extension for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 的 NuGet 管理員擴充功能

trans-unit.source: NuGet is the package manager for the Microsoft development platform including .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: NuGet 是 Microsoft 開發平台 (包括 .NET Core) 的封裝管理員。

trans-unit.source: You need [NuGet 3.5.0](https://dist.nuget.org/visualstudio-2015-vsix/v3.5.0-beta/NuGet.Tools.vsix) or higher to build .NET Core apps.
trans-unit.target: 您需具備 [NuGet 3.5.0](https://dist.nuget.org/visualstudio-2015-vsix/v3.5.0-beta/NuGet.Tools.vsix) 或更高版本，來建置 .NET Core 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core tools for Visual Studio 2015
trans-unit.target: 適用於 Visual Studio 2015 的 .NET Core 工具

trans-unit.source: Download and install the [.NET Core 1.0.1 - VS 2015 Tooling Preview 2][sdk].
trans-unit.target: 下載並安裝 [.NET Core 1.0.1 - VS 2015 工具 Preview 2][SDK]。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Core Tooling package installs .NET Core, project templates and other tools for Visual Studio 2015.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具套件會安裝 .NET Core、專案範本和其他適用於 Visual Studio 2015 的工具。

trans-unit.source: Currently, you cannot download an offline installer for [.NET Core 1.0.1 - VS 2015 Tooling Preview 2][sdk].
trans-unit.target: 目前，您無法下載適用於 [.NET Core 1.0.1 - VS 2015 工具 Preview 2][SDK] 的離線安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you have to download the [regular bootstrapper][sdk] and run it with a command-line option (such as, `/layout c:\path`) to get an offline layout.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須改為下載[一般啟動載入器][SDK]並使用命令列選項 (例如 `/layout c:\path`) 來執行，以取得離線的版面配置。

trans-unit.source: After that, it can be used as an offline installer: just run the executable from the local path.
trans-unit.target: 之後，您只要從本機路徑執行可執行檔，即可將它做為離線安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that because it's a full layout, this procedure downloads all the packages for all supported languages, which is around 1 GB in size.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，由於它是完整的版面配置，因此這個程序會下載所有支援的語言套件，大小約 1 GB。

trans-unit.source: [sdk]: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=827546
trans-unit.target: [SDK]: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=827546
